                                     String name,
                                     int recordLength,
                                     Charset encoding)
                              throws FileNotFoundException
Creates a new NamedInputStream that wraps a file. The specified file provides the underlying resource of the NamedStream.

Parameters:
file - File.
name - Stream name.
recordLength - Record length.
encoding - Encoding (if applicable).
Returns:
Returns the NamedInputStream.

reader

public static NamedBufferedReader reader(File file,
                                         String name,
                                         Charset encoding)
                                  throws IOException
Creates a new NamedBufferedReader that wraps a file. The specified file provides the underlying resource of the NamedStream. The file is read using the user-defined encoding in the Bo2 configuration.

Parameters:
file - File.
name - Stream name.
encoding - Encoding (if applicable).
Returns:
Returns the NamedBufferedReader.
Throws:
IOException

reader

public static NamedBufferedReader reader(BufferedReader br,
                                         String name,
                                         Charset encoding)
Creates a new NamedBufferedReader that wraps a buffered reader. The specified reader provides the underlying resource of the NamedStream. It is the responsibility of the developer that uses this method to use the user-defined encoding from the Bo2 configuration.

Parameters:
br - Stream.
name - Stream name.
encoding -
Returns:
Returns the NamedBufferedReader.
